articles.title: Sudan evacuations gather pace in fighting lull - Reuters.com
articles.description: Europe, China and Japan raced to extract their citizens from Khartoum on Monday and thousands more people took advantage of an apparent lull in fighting between the army and a paramilitary force over the past two days to escape Sudan.
articles.content: KHARTOUM, April 24 (Reuters) - Europe, China and Japan raced to extract their citizens from Khartoum on Monday and thousands more people took advantage of an apparent lull in fighting between the arm… [+5511 chars]

articles.author: Henry Foy, Yuan Yang, Joe Leahy
articles.title: China walks back ambassador's remarks on sovereignty of post-Soviet states - Financial Times
articles.description: Beijing’s envoy to France stoked furore in Baltics by questioning legal status of European countries
articles.content: Beijing has been forced to backtrack after its ambassador to France sparked a furore in Europe at the weekend by questioning the legal status of former Soviet states and Ukraines sovereignty over Cri… [+4215 chars]
